snippet: Elise Morrissey’s mother is called Alyce Morrissey. This confused Joe Russo IV when he tried to ask Ms. Morrissey out for a drink via a Christmas card.
abstract: Vows column on wedding of Joe Russo IV and Elise Morrissey.
lead_paragraph: Elise Morrissey’s mother is called Alyce Morrissey. This confused Joe Russo IV when he tried to ask Ms. Morrissey out for a drink via a Christmas card.

headline.main: Me or My Mother? A Romantic Message Goes Astray
